description: Jens Deters started with (home-) computing about 25 years ago. During the last 15 years he owned several roles in the IT & Telecommunication sector (Software Developer, Trainer, Consultant, Project Manager and Product Manager). His major passion is still developing software. Today he works as a Senior IT Consultant and at codecentric in Germany. He regularly blogs about his projects to contribute to the JavaFX- and IoT-Community MQTT.fx. Jens is also member of the NetBeans Dream Team.
